tc = int(input())
while tc!=0:
 size = int(input())
 data = [] 
 data = list(map(int,input().split()))
 if size == 1:
  print("1")
  tc -= 1
  continue
 i = 2
 count = 2
 max = 2
 while i < size:
  if data[i] == (data[i-1] + data[i-2]):
   count+=1
   if count > max:
    max = count
  else:
   count = 2
  i+=1
 print(max)
 tc -= 1
